TopicTitle: VAB/SPH: control of distance the held part is from camera

Articles.Content:
This may come up from my misunderstanding of something but anyway:

When I pick a part from the list, the game selects at which distance from the camera the part will be. If I rotate the camera as I am trying to place the part, it moves along some invisible plane. If it hits something (most usually floor), the part stops following the view and cannot be placed at such angle.

More often in SPH but sometimes in VAB, the part is placed initially at some ridiculously high distance and placing it in such case becomes pretty hard.

My suggestion is to:

- hold the part at constant distance from the camera instead of moving it along a plane

- add a control (key, mouse) which would allow me to adjust how far the part is from the camera.

Edited February 27, 2014 by Kasuha
Yeah i'ts annoying sometimes. You just need to rotate the camer and then pick up the part when the camera is closer.
Good idea, I do think at some point in the future Squad will have a look at the edited and give it a well deserved overhall, perhaps at the same time as the spaceplanes
